entry.title: no ones son
entry.summary:
Author: Akuma_mist

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,713Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Jason Todd wasn’t saved by the system. He slipped through its cracks—bruised, bitter, and done with being anyone’s victim. After surviving a brutal childhood, he rebuilds himself in Gotham's underground, trading his name for a mask and his pain for fists. As Red Hood, he's known, respected, and feared. As Jason Todd, he’s just trying to stay invisible.But when a chance encounter puts him on the Bat Family’s radar, Jason finds himself reluctantly tethered to the life he thought he didn’t want. He never expected Dick Grayson to be the one to look past the mask. To see him—not as a case, a project, or a threat—but as someone worth fighting for.It’s a story about survival, identity, and learning to heal in a city that doesn’t make it easy. And somewhere in the middle of it all, two broken boys might just find something they never thought they’d have again—each other.
